title: Flip-Flop Dynamic Reset and Set
description: This FUNCTION_BLOCK implements a flip-flop with dynamic reset (RST) and set (SET) inputs. The block outputs a boolean Q based on the state of the inputs (D, CLK, RST, SET). It updates the output Q on the rising edge of the clock input (CLK) or when a reset or set request is made. If the reset (RST) is active, Q is set to NOT RST. Otherwise, Q follows the data input (D) when the clock signal rises.
name: FF_DRE

input.name: SET
input.description: Input to set the output Q to high.

input.name: D
input.description: Data input that determines the value of output Q when CLK is high.

input.name: CLK
input.description: Clock input that triggers the update of output Q on its rising edge.

input.name: RST
input.description: Input to reset the output Q.

output.name: Q
output.description: Output that represents the state of the flip-flop.
